tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_due_date DATE,
  last_usage_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecord (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  technician_name VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_frequency INT
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  technician_name VARCHAR(255),
  maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE UsageLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  user_name VARCHAR(255),
  usage_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Repairs (
  repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  repair_date DATE,
  repair_type VARCHAR(255),
  repair_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    acquisition_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Usage_Log (
    usage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
    usage_date DATE,
    hours_used INT,
    user_id VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Repairs (
    repair_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
    repair_date DATE,
    issue_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Replacement_Log (
    replacement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
    replacement_date DATE,
    reason_for_replacement TEXT,
    replacement_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
